e: 例⃝「`隔行如隔山~，`外行~`人~`難免~`瞎子摸象~，`多~`所~`臆測~」。
d.f: `比喻~`以偏概全~，`不能~`全面~`了解~。`也~`作~「`盲人摸象~」。

English: blind people touch an elephant (idiom, from Nirvana sutra `大~`般~`涅槃~`經~|`大~`般~`涅~盘经[da4 ban1 Nie4 pan2 jing1]); fig. unable to see the big picture
to mistake the part for the whole
unable to see the wood for the trees
